H0.text: Prior to Viginia Wade in 1977 who was the last British player to win a tennis Grand Slam title. Ann Jones

H1.text: Prior to Viginia Wade in 1977 who was the last British player to win a tennis Grand Slam title. Angela Mortimer

H2.text: Prior to Viginia Wade in 1977 who was the last British player to win a tennis Grand Slam title. Shirley Bloomer

H3.text: Prior to Viginia Wade in 1977 who was the last British player to win a tennis Grand Slam title. Sue Barker

A4.text: Mortimer won three major singles titles: the 1955 French Championships, the 1958 Australian Championships and 1961 Wimbledon Championships

A5.text: making her the first British winner of the women's title since Dorothy Round in 1937
